HP R5000 SNMP

Available versions


  • ver. 5.0
  • ver. 5.4


HP R5000 SNMP

Description

HP R5000 UPS SNMP Made bu Ennio

Overview

Monitor power parametrs: frequency, power, voltage, current, temp. Full control for Input, Output (Segment), Battery, Bypass. I used CPQPOWER1.76.MIB and UPS-MIB.mib

Author

Ennio

Macros used

|Name|Description|Default|Type| |—-|———–|——-|—-| |{$SNMP_COMMUNITY}|<p>-</p>|``|Text macro|

Template links

There are no template links in this template.

Discovery rules

There are no discovery rules in this template.
